t:
My friend asked me to write a poem,
I said I would do it in a jiffy.
She waited patiently for my rhyme,
Sadly, I only came up with this.
c:
My friend asked me to write a poem,
I said I would do it in a jiffy.
She waited patiently for my rhyme,
Sadly, I only came up with this.





SPOILER:





This is supposed to be a subtle joke. You do get it, right? Right?



Here's your prompt for the Day 216 of Writing Sprints.
